text: Luo Meizhen (July 9, 1885 – June 11, 2013) was a Chinese woman who claimed to be the world's oldest person. It is unknown if Meizhen was the world's oldest person since there China did not keep birth certificates when she was born.World’s ‘Oldest Person,' 127-Year-Old Luo Meizhen, Dies In China at International Business News.com She was allegedly, probably, the world's oldest woman.World’s ‘oldest woman’ dies at The Peninsula Qatar.com Meizhen died of natural causes at the claimed age of 127 on June 11, 2013 in Guangxi == References == Category:1885 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Longevity claims Category:Chinese supercentenarians Category:People from Guangxi Category:21st-century Chinese people Category:20th-century Chinese people
title: Luo Meizhen
